pages.title: Magic Powder
pages.text: Magic Powder is a crafting ingredient which is also important when creating $(l:e_spell_overview)Spells/el. In addition to the crafting recipe, it can also be created by $(l:e_block_mana_infuser)infusing/el some $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_powder)Deep Crystal Powder/el with $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el.
